scripts.build:all: npm run build:common && npm run build:main && npm run build:pio
scripts.build:pio: ng build pio --prod --single-bundle && npm run pack
scripts.main: npm run build:common && npm run start:main
scripts.main:pio: npm run build:common && npm run build:pio && npm run start:main
scripts.deploy: npm version patch && npm run deploy:all
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:common && npm run deploy:pio && npm run deploy:main
scripts.deploy:common: npm version patch --prefix projects/common && npm run build:common && npm publish ./dist/common --access public
scripts.deploy:main: npm version patch --prefix projects/main && npm run build:main && npm publish ./dist/main --access public
scripts.deploy:pio: npm version patch --prefix projects/pio && npm run build:pio && npm publish ./dist/pio --access public
scripts.pack:pio: rimraf dist/pio/wc && mkdirp dist/pio/wc && npm run pack:main && npm run pack:pollyfills && npm run pack:join
scripts.build: npm run build:common && npm run build:pio
